name: AVAudioSession.Location
desc: Constants that describe the location of the data source on device.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static let lower: AVAudioSession.Location
items.desc: A value that indicates that the data source is located near the bottom end of the device.

items.name: static let upper: AVAudioSession.Location
items.desc: A value that indicates that the data source is located near the top end of the device.
